22065751.review:
[h1]Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Assets reused right[/h1]

Neptunia U, the spin off of classic Neptunia titles. Closest comparison of this game is probably Dynasty Warriors - but simplier. You are put into the arena, you fight hundreds of mobs, and occassional (mini) boss. Let's break it down into points:

[b]Gameplay:[/b] Satisfying.
Even through you don't have that many combos, and abillities are just 2 buttons + animation, it looks very satisfying (who doesn't love 20+ numbers on screen wih 5 and more digits, while everything explodes and your character flies around?). 
It is easy to master too! I got handle of it in 2 battles. 10 characters also give you some variety in gameplay.

[b]Music:[/b] Hyping up
Just entering the title screen made me love soundtrack of this game. It hypes you up a lot, and fits gameplay.
My personal favorites are surely: [One, two, three] and the title screen one.

[b]Performance:[/b] Great port
So, I play on my crappy laptop with i3 and an old Nvidia 520m, and I am hanging around 60FPS most of the time. Drops only happen when I get my camera behind a barrier, or if I stream the game via Steam streaming to my friends (drops to 30fps - game speed slows down, instead of skipping frames).

[b]Visuals:[/b]
Well, some pictures are kinda blurry, which might be port's fault, but aside of that, game is very colorful.

[b]Controls:[/b]
I did already touch this in gameplay, but I gotta say, this game is totaly fine with a keyboard. Only problem I often have is a camera (I just don't touch it outside of reset camera button). Button mapping can be a pain at first, but after you learn keys,  it's easy. It is surely better with controler, but as someone who doesn't have one, I am glad I can play with my keyboard.

[b]Others:[/b]
- Storyline is same as you would expect from other Neptunia titles - Not really super serious, funny dialogue, likable characters.
- Game also has a lots of Fan Service, which might be a pro or a con, depends on you. Anyway, cloth tearing can be disabled when your characters hits.. lvl 20 i think? You just need a "hard" outfit. Althrough it will remove a boost from teared clothes.
- Also, game is full of reused assets (ASSets har har) you might know from Re;birth 1 or 2... but hey, they made a spin off out of it, and it is fun to play, so I have no problem with that.
- Quests... well there could use some variety. Most of the time its just "Kill X monsters" or "Kill a boss" (which means you have to kill X monsters to spawn him). "Collect an item" is another "Kill a boss", but without "Kill X monsters". 


Overall its a very fun game and a great port with nice to look at combat. I would totaly recommend to at least try it (You can refund games in 2 hours anyway!)

22065049.review:
Embora tenha outros jogos da franquia Nep Nep em minha conta, Action Unleashed é o primeiro que joguei por se distanciar do combate por turnos da série RPG e se aproximar de um universo "Musou", e não me arrependo nem um pouco disso... Exceto pela cara de reprovação da minha família ao ver garotinhas que podemos classificar como Waifus serem desprovidas de suas roupas em meio a uma dura batalha travada contra girassóis bonitinhos e Mechas que fariam inveja a todos da série Gundam.

Se eu olhar toda essa situação pelo ângulo de minha família, eu consigo imaginar como é difícil imaginar um homem de 22 anos se divertir com tanta coisa "infantil", mas eles não sabem que o mais difícil é conseguir conter as ereções e a vontade fulminante de fapar quando a Vert está semi nua em sua frente.

Provavelmente vou ser considerado um fracassado minha vida toda, mas que se dane, pois a Vert-sama está ao meu lado!


Ah, e o jogo tem uma trilha sonora muito boa, com um destaque especial pra música e animação de abertura, que passa uma energia incrível.

公司总算是做了转型，虽然是比较失败的……新的尝试总不会是一帆风顺的，U算是给后来的游戏铺路了。尝试是值得肯定的，但是缺点也很多

22058739.review:
[b]A supposedly non-canonical spin-off of the Nep-nep series that takes the more action-y route as opposed to its usual turn-based dungeon-crawlilng RPG style.[/b] The Neptunia series isn't exactly well known for its "exciting" gameplay and this one's no different. The idea of going from RPG to beat-em-up/hack-and-slash thing was there but the way it's done I don't believe makes it anymore exciting especially when repetition is a trait this series comes with.

The default keybindings are abysmal, but rebindable. It doesn't help that the tutorial is meant for controllers and  that all the mouse can do when it's used at all is move the camera around but only while holding the LMB. The game was meant for a controller and not much work was put into the thought of keyboard (& mouse) play.

One piece of trouble with the actual game is that you're practically going through the same dungeon each and every time with a goalset barely different from the last. "Clear condition" for a "quest" may be to kill 300some enemies or find the exit but it all just comes down to "go here and kill what you see" with barely any form of thought into actually doing so, and that's the entire game up to the final boss and its "end-game" content.
There are a teeny few bit of combos from the melee characters (which having a minute number itself isn't helpful for this kind of game) but the three ranged ones have far less and when they transform it doesn't take much effort to obliterate everything and win harmless since you can keep floating around and shooting while keeping the loads of enemies stunned. The transformations are supposed to be temporary but all the ranged characters can go by transformed for the duration of an entire run because of how much of a mob they can keep hitting.
With the look of how practically all of the recycled enemies have always been throughout the series most of 'em don't exactly give off that threatening look so I didn't get a whole lot of fun out of wailing on loads of plush toy look-a-likes. They eventually hit pretty hard but the repetition still kicks in when doing the same task over and over again. 
You're free to choose which dungeon you go to. Entering and completing "NEW" dungeons eventually progresses the story, which itself I found was very underwhelming & short, at least in comparison to its RPG counterparts.

Hitting the level cap doesn't take much work especially if going through the "end-game" content. Lily rank returns in this game and obviously increases for the partners you choose to go in a dungeon together and as usual the higher the rank with said characters the more benefits they get when paired up. Trying to maximize Lily ranks however proves to be more work though than leveling.
Supposedly with different Lily ranks per character you can press whatever button or key in the Lily rank menu and the selected pair will engage in small dialogue. If you've got the English dubbing off and can't understand Japanese, there aren't any subtitles to help for that since the dialogue itself is on-the-spot unlike the cutscenes that at least give you an idea of what they're saying if not something completely different because of the localization.
Apparently you can't pause during those VN cutscenes and can't rewatch them if you accidentally skipped 'em unless you've got a previous save in hand for the occassion.

So it's a badly localized, bare-bones action Nep game without a whole actual lot of Neps at least to give me a proper time with the addition of the usual repetition but with relatively more poor gameplay that more-or-less entices with characters being stripped when hit a lot, which in itself eventually becomes a bore. You can apparently be rewarded with clothing that doesn't break when equipped in case you get tired of the stripping and/or if you're a prude.

22058226.review:
Things To Remember before the Review: I've played all 3 rebirths, but not finnished them yet. I've not played Dynasty Warriors or other Horde Beat 'em Ups (Unless the first Gauntlet game and Gauntlet: Dark Legacy count). And finally, I've not 100% the game yet (and it looks like a doozy, Completionists beware) but I did beat the main story of the game.
P.S. I stuck with playing with 5 teams (there are 10 playable charecters and most of the time you form teams of 2 with them.
Pros
Game breaks the 4th wall same as ever: "Game Designers, I thought we made a promise not to cross this line!" -Neptune
Nep Nep and crew are back at it again (along with 2 newcomers)
Gameplay is a beat 'em up style instead of an RPG (And feels quick paced)
You feel powerful in HDD mode (I never felt that powerful in the Rebirth Series because HDD mode never felt like all that much of a boost.)
SP has a quick recovery time so use those abilities like thier's no tommarrow!
 Mixed
The Clothes do break with using enough power attacks and taking damage. I put this as mixed because it does increase the rate that your EXE drive increases, but a cutscene plays everytime it does taking focus away from the action (And towards the action if you know what I mean. >_< ). You can get (mostly)unbreakable versions of these oultfits as you play.
You can listen to conversations between the charecters as thier lily rank increases. (The game lies about it being unique to every level, from what I've seen it's every 2)
If the voices get annoying you can mute any or all of them. (No idea why you would, but whatever)
Cons
Since this isn't an RPG, there are less cutscenes, and while some may think this is good, I liked the cutsenes in the Rebirth series.
There weren't any really memorable moments in this game, unlike Rebirth(s) where they had a lot of memorability.
If your not in HDD mode you have between 4-8 hits before your knocked out.
No Sadie =( (No idea why she would be here but I'm sad anyways)
The plot is about interviews for a magazine article. Enough said.
Compa and IF Don't show up in the main story.
Finnished main story in 12 hours or so, but plenty of content yet to go.
All in all, I think the gameplay is good, but the story has small, yet meaty bones. But, you don't need a good story for a beat 'em up now do you?
I give this a Nep/ten (I you want an actual rating, I loved this game and got it on monday and beat it by wensday. 9/10 needs moar nep.)
Note: Be warned, your friend and family will likely glare at you while you play this, and likely think you are playing hentai.(That is if they care.)
Average for the series though really.
Edit: I forgot, try not to stand still, because you can get knocked down, and you don't have any invencibility frames. I've had a few occasions where I'm at full health and get knocked out because my enemies comboed me to death, so try not to stand still for too long! And being parylized sucks!

22057461.review:
I can see the game being fun, but the keyboard and mouse controls are really clunky. Now, WASD to move and the IJKL setup to attack is reasonable, but the fact that the game is 3D, and the only convenient camera buttons are the numpad keys, makes this setup very uncomfortable. I also find it strange that while the right mouse button controls the camera, which is perfectly fine, the left mouse button does nothing except for interact in menus. It'd be nice to have it be used as an alternative input for a standard attack. That kind of control scheme would be more comfortable (And no, remapping doesn't work, as the game doesn't even respond when I try to).

Again, I can see the appeal in this game, but the controls are the only thing keeping me from enjoying it. If you primarily use a keyboard and mouse, I recommend holding off on buying until they add some additional control capability (even just making the primary mouse a useable attack button would make me change my mind)

They took the maps from the previous titles... okay that's the bad stuff about this game, even with this in mind, it's amazing.
It's a good decision to move away from turn based to real time.
It could be a bit more difficult, but that part is covered by additional stuff like Neptral Tower (50 Stages with different lvl requirements for quick leveling chars after the main story) or the Gameindustri Gauntlet (a tournament with nice difficulty settings) which lets you play tornaments with all characters.

22047541.review:
Finally, after years and three lazy ports they at least managed to fix Neptune's broken 3D mesh and idle animation. 
Of course, with any other franchise you'd expect the devs and publisher to fix and improve a lot more than that, but that's not how Idea Factory roll. So,.... Yay!!!^^

The game itself feels quite polished for a Neptunia game, but it's also shorter and less "complex" than the previous titles. 
Visuals are ok, most 3D assets were recycled from Rebirth1/2/3 anyway (the "HD"-textures, models and animations are "of course" even older), a quite convenient "running gag" with the Neptunia series. 
Somehow the effects during fights look a bit nicer than in Victory.
Maybe they sacrificed a couple more minutes of their precious time to tweak the shaders, or maybe the game simply runs really well with the current Nvidia drivers. Who knows, and who cares.

The game goes really easy on my hardware, my primary GTX970 doesn't even bother to power up beyond P2 state and gives me constant 60 fps at 20-30% load, while my second 970 sleeps through all the action that is unleashed. CPU load is even less noteworthy. So, while the first "rebirth" tried to hog more resources than it deserved, this port seems to be far better optimised and will probably run smoothly on many laptops and older desktop rigs.

I use a XBoneOne controller, which is imo the best input device for games of this series, but mouse support seems to be further improved as well. ( by which I mean precision and input lag, you still have to manually edit the config file and add your desired key bindings, so a gamepad is still the way to go )

The rest is simply what you'd expect from a Neptunia game. Nerdy japanese humor, parodies and game references, lots of fanservice and yuri subtext,.. and of course the characters don't just occasionally break the fourth wall, they once more tear it down right from the start.  

So, yeah... it's a Neptunia game, which means it's as charming as it is flawed.
A bit simpler and faster paced than the other games of the series, but basicly   moar  Nep Nep .

And like any Neptunia/ Idea Factory game this title is also rediculously overpriced.
I picked it up for 17€ (-40% promotion offer), which imo should be the regular price. 
Maybe even a bit less.
Neptunia games are fun and entertaining with well written cute waifus, that's why we still buy them.
But even if you can create halfway decent sequels by simply writing new dialogue and recycling 99% of the 3D assets, 
neither does it mean that you should, nor that such a garage kit game build is worth half the price of a AAA title.

So yes, buy it, it's a fun game like the other Neptunia titles, but buy it when it's on sale for half or less.
Even if it's not about the money because you're super rich or whatever, be patient and do it for the statement^^.

22047225.review:
It's like Dynasty Warriors + Senran Kagura with one big problem, or two.
Many problems actually. I'll mention the most annoying ones to me:

A/ You can stun-locked forever and most enemies WILL exploit use this to their advantage
B/ You're weak as shit, even on the first level you'll die in 4-5 hits
C/ Your character only moves in 8 directions for some stupid reason, enemies don't
D/ Your attacks are slow and stiff, you WILL be hit if you don't dash cancel, and get stunlocked, and die

Basically you'll be fucked instantly unless you're mashing Attack and Dash. 
Get hit a few times and you're done. You can barely move across the battle field reliably.
No amount of fanservice or cute characters will ever make a bad game good.
Regardless of how nice it looks it's still trash.

Порядок событий:
1. Купил игру.
2. Скачал и сел поиграть.
3. Получил в ухо от жены, ибо "пялился на "девочек" в рваной одежде".
4. Продолжил играть.
5. Внутриигровая вайфу намекнула, что если буду смотреть на нее, "после жаркого боя", то могу сесть в тюрьму....
6. Выключил "новую" часть Неп-неп...задумался...на что я трачу свое время....
(с) допрос Подозреваемого...

Как описать игру кратко? Здесь все для фанатов!

Подробнее? Хорошо.
Не знаете кто такая Неп-Неп? Не можете отличить Ром от Рам? Вам непонятны взаимоотношения всех героев? Здесь все для фанатов, проходите мимо.

Всегда мечтали хоть частично заголить Ноар? Или может Юни? Ваши грязные желания могут быть здесь реализованы, ведь все для фанатов! Здесь даже есть костюмы, которые легче рвутся)

Даже переход от полюбившейся пошаговой боевки с комбо и навыками могут простить только фанаты...ведь Неп-неп...

И ведь не сказать, что игра плохая, но ориентация явно на определенную немногочисленную в общих рамках аудиторию. Правильное ли решение...

По графической составляющей претензий нет...1080p есть и хорошо. Избыток фансервиса присутствует. Со звуком все прекрасно...оригинальные голоса есть, задор персонажей сохранен.

Самое тяжелое...геймплей.  Игра стала слешером...в целом простеньким, но это не значит, что врагов можно просто закликать...ибо огромная толпа супостатов может спокойно задавить числом, а потому без грамотной оценки ситуации и позиционирования делать нечего. Мне лично нравилась "старая" боевая система больше...впрочем и эту принял, буду продолжать играть.

По итогу: только для фанатов или хотя бы тех, кто знает историю вселенной Нептунии. Всем желающим познакомиться с серией лучше начать с 1-го ребёрфа.

优点：
CV+++（海王星的一贯优点）
60帧+++
1080P++（还是略糊，但还是很不错）
爆衣+（虽然真的绅士是不屑于看爆衣的）
动作设计+（还是弄得比较炫酷的，如果要跟传统ACT比，那还是太naive了）

缺点：
bug（之后会说到）--
打击感（大部分时间像在切棉花...音效太弱）--
重复度巨高的任务--（作为act或者arpg这点是硬伤）
操纵手感- （仔细感受就发现是生硬的8向移动，不过问题不大）

本作评分10/10（作为act并不合格，但是这可是信仰！nep！）
（你要问我为什么这么熟练，我会告诉你无可奉告！（抱头））
本作是属于海王星的外传系列，和主线剧情并没有啥大的关系，
说实话这一作还是蛮无聊的，建议入坑的话从重生一开始而不是本作

游玩建议：不建议打汉化，目前的汉化质量看上去都很渣，建议吭英文或者等日文文本打出来吭日文。海王星系列的英文并不太难，本作属于粉丝向，不过萌豚也是必买的（笑）如果只是想玩ACT的话还是出门左转鬼泣吧...

关于调高分辨率导致黑屏无法进入游戏的解决办法：
海王星U默认配置文件作为存档保存，所以删除掉你配置的分辨率存档，即可初始化游戏设置，存档路径如下c:/steamlibrary/steamapps/common/Neptunia U/savedata
删掉里面的nep_sys01即可（还不行的同学请关闭云存档，然后删除文件并验证完整性试试）（关掉云存档，等到设置到稳定的参数后再打开就行）
[spoiler]另外可以设置用集显启动，成功几率不保证可能是个例[/spoiler]
关于在过场读图过程中产生的黑屏解决办法：
1.通过ctrl+alt+delete切屏可以解决.

22036460.review:
-%%% This review is coming from someone who previously knew absolutely nothing about this series %%%-

I bought this game just kinda hoping for a game to hack n' slash away and random shet because why not, and I ended up being pleasantly surprised.
I'd always see the games in this series pop up on steam but never bothered (personally not a turn-based kinda person), but a few days ago I saw this as a new release and just clicked on it, and found it was an action-y spin off of that one series I keep seeing everywhere. Look up some things on the game and thought it looked really fun, so I bought it.
From my understanding, this series is an RPG series set to kinda make fun of the gaming industry, and contains many subtle-and not so subtle-nods to things (i.e characters named Famitsu and Dengekiko) and such, and, well..

wao

So, what I really liked about this game is the fluent combat and the extremely colorful visuals, as well as the pretty cool characters (my fav character is probably Neptune, but my fav character to play as is Famitsu). The voice acting is pretty good, the dialogue and such is entertaining, the music is pretty cool and I like the change of tone when you transform into your HDD mode, and overall the game is quite fun to play. There's some pretty good character customization for each character and all characters except for Famitsu and Dengekiko start with 2-3 different outfit colors & hair colors for their normal and HDD forms, but you gain more weapons and such over time of playing.

But there are quite a few things that I absolutely hated about this game or just really didn't like; I feel like the sound design is absolutely terrible sometimes, most characters don't feel like they do much to enemies - like you're wacking things with nerf swords (with the exception of Dengekiko, Famitsu, and Blanc), some special attacks don't have sound effects or sound bland and boring even though they look flashy and cool af, and sometimes the enemies are a pain in the ass. There've been multiple occasions where I'd get trapped in a circle of enemies that relentlessly obliterate both my characters in seconds without any hope of escaping. Also, sometimes it feels like the characters are really unbalanced, like how ranged characters transformed into their HDD mode are pretty much untouchable in most occasions. There isn't much of a story, but from what I've gathered, the main series has a much more involved story than this spin-off. One more thing, the combos feel a little strict and you won't find yourself straying from the same combos sometimes. Oh yeah, and there's a weird slow down when your framerate drops under 60FPS (don't worry, the game is reltatively easy to run, just run on lower resolution and/or windowed mode)

IN CONCLUSION:

Pros:
-Fun combat
-Pretty visuals & flashy attacks and skills
-Cool and relatively interesting characters
-Pretty good music
-Alright character customization
-Interesting dialogue
-Easy to run on lower-end computers (for me at least and I can barely run Tera and Skyrim)
-( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Cons:
-Awful sound design
-Weird speed drop with framerate drop sometimes
-Sometimes frustrating enemies
-Meh story
-Kinda unbalanced

Overall, I feel this was one of the best games on steam that I've bought in quite a while.

22018003.review:
I know I don't have a lot of time in this game but I'm going to put this review up really early because somethings need to be said. This is a not a Dynasty Warriors/Senran Kagura game with a Hyperdimension Neptunia paintjob, but more of the heart of Hyperdimension with the gameplay of the former implanted. I've never played Dynasty Warriors, but from some quick googling it's about being cartoonishly overpowered and taking out hoards of goarmless enemies, but takes the lead of Senran and keeps you going instead of running back and forth. Oh, and if they get hit theit clothes tear off, that also came from Senran. Of course I'm a sucker for costume degradation, sexualized or not. I love that they kept everything very light, the jokes come so fast one of them had to be pointed out by a character in the game. Having said all that; I'm now going to say that there seems to be a good chance this game will crash on you, its already happened to me 5 times in 67 minutes of play, though don't try to divine an average, it's been totally random. But don't be discouraged by this, since I have faith that Idea Factory, Compile Heart, or Tamsoft, whichever is in charge of the programming, will get most of the bugs sorted out pretty quick.
Odds are you've already decided to buy this game or not, so if you're in then get a controller (I maintain this series is otherwise borderline unplayable on keyboard) and disappoint you're parents as you let girls be stripped bare to the world by dogoos, and remember, none of this is canon

22017660.review:
Neptunia U goes in a very different direction from the rest of the series. Instead of a dialogue heavy JRPG you get a hack and slash beat 'em up that reminds a bit of dynasty warriors. 

Combat and controls are pretty good, but not as fluid as a proper platformer like devil may cry or bayonetta. The game is played through lists of missions which lets you skip around and replay as you choose. Dialogue is heavy at first, then extremely sparse. Thankfully there's no Plutia.


Overall a fun game but not quite as good as the rest of the Hyperdimension series.

22017222.review:
ไม่อยากจะเกริ่นอะไรเท่าไหร่ งั้นขอบอกข้อดีและข้อเสียเลยละกัน

[b] ข้อดี [/b]
- เป็นเกมแนว Musou หรือแนววิ่งๆฟันๆนั่นเอง ไม่ใช่ Turn Base แบบตระกูลภาค Rebirth ที่ผ่านมา
- โดนตีแล้วเสื้อขาดได้ ( สำหรับสายหื่นโดยเฉพาะ /ฮา )
- มีระบบส่องด่านขณะที่กำลังสู้อยู่ได้ด้วย ( ก็สำหรับสายหื่นอีกนั่นแหละ /เอาไว้ส่องพื้นที่ศักดิ์สิทธิ์ หุหุหุ )
- ตัวไฟล์เกมมีขนาดน้อยมาก ถ้าเทียบกับเกมตระกูล Neptunia ด้วยกัน

[b] ข้อเสีย [/b]
- สำหรับใครที่ชอบสไตล์การเล่นแบบ Turn Base ที่เป็นเสน่ห์ของ Neptunia เหมือนภาคหลักๆ ก็ขอบอกเลยนะครับว่า ให้มองข้ามภาคนี้ไปได้เลย
- ถ้าใครไม่ชอบอะไรที่มันซ้ำซากจำเจเท่าไหร่ ทั้งระบบต่อสู้ ดันเจี้ยน หรือมอนสเตอร์ ที่ถึงจะหลายโหมดให้ลองเล่นก็เถอะ แต่ก็ยังซ้ำซากจำเจเหมือนเดิม ขอแนะนำว่าอย่าเพิ่งลองเลยครับ 
- ภาพในตอนนี้ ยังเหมือนพอร์ตมาจาก PS Vita ได้ยังไม่ค่อยดีสำหรับ PC เท่าไหร่ เนื่องจากปรับจอใหญ่แล้ว สามารถเห็นภาพที่แตกๆได้อย่างชัดเจน ( ในอนาคตเค้าอาจจะแพทเกมให้มันดีขึ้นกว่านี้ก็ได้ ก็ต้องรอดูกันต่อไป )
- ในเรื่องการปรับจอย น่าจะสามารถใส่ได้แค่จอย Xbox เท่านั้น ?? ( ไม่แน่ใจเท่าไหร่เหมือนกันในเรื่องนี้ แต่เนื่องจากใส่จอย 199 ( พอดีงบน้อย /ฮา ) 
แล้วไม่สามารถตั้งค่าให้จอยใช้งานได้ จึงเดาได้ว่าน่าจะใช้จอย Xbox ได้อย่างเดียว 
( จอยสำหรับของเครื่อง PS ทั้งหลาย ผมไม่มีจึงไม่ได้ลอง ถ้าใครลองแล้วก็มาบอกต่อกันหน่อยนะว่ามันใช้ร่วมกันได้หรือเปล่า ) 
เพราะว่าสำหรับ Neptunia ภาคอื่นๆก็สามารถใช้จอย 199 เล่นได้ปกติ ดังนั้นผมจึงอาจจะบอกว่านี้เป็นข้อเสียได้ไม่เต็มปากเท่าไหร่นัก ( อีกอย่างเกมนี้มันก็ควรที่จะเล่นด้วยจอย Xbox อยู่แล้วนี่เนอะ /ฮา )

ในส่วนของเนื้อเรื่องขอไม่นำมารีวิวนะครับ เนื่องด้วยเหตุผลบางประการ

แล้วก็ในส่วนของบัคในเกม เท่าที่เล่นมาก็ไม่เจออะไรเท่าไหร่นะ เพียงแต่แค่มีอาการเสียงกับภาพไม่ตรงกันในบางจังหวะเท่านั้นเอง โดยส่วนตัวแล้ว สำหรับผมก็ไม่นับว่าเป็นปัญหาอะไรมาก แต่ก็อาจจะเสียอรรถรสในการเล่นไปซักหน่อย

สรุปโดยรวม ถ้าใครชื่นชอบเกมตระกูล Neptunia แต่อาจจะไม่ชอบอะไรที่มันซ้ำซากน่าเบื่อจนเกินไป แนะนำว่าให้รอไปก่อนฮะ แล้วค่อยมาสอยก็ยังทันครับผม ^^

22015894.review:
I hope you like words.

Pros:
- It's a Nep game
- Its a Hack and Slash, for those who are a fan of those
- Each character has their different attacks, combos, SP skills, etc, which gives each character its own sense of "uniqueness"
- Filled with classic Nep moments in events
- Costume Break, because everyone wants them boobs
- Speaking of boobs, they jiggle on the in-game character models, which is fantastic
- Visually appealing in more ways than one
- HDD is the untimate "Cheese it" button

Cons:
- You better be ready to get carpal tunnel syndrome
- Repetitive
- Somewhat lacking in content compared to the Re;Birth series
- Blurtasticly blurry at lower resolutions 
- Uni is extremely overpowered compared to everyone else due to Rapid Fire
- Difficult to understand controls for newbies to the series
- The story is easy, the endgame content will eat you alive

To conclude. If you plan on buying this game you better be ready to mash buttons like never before. Unless you're Uni. In that case, just go grab your nearest paperweight and you're good as gold.

But seriously though, if one can ignore the flaws that this game has, this game along with Hyperdevotion Noire (Super excited for this one) will (hopefully) supply all you Nep fans with enough Nep until Megadimension eventually crawls its way onto Steam's storefront. For those newcomers to the series, I hope you'll enjoy the game as much as I did. I enjoyed this a lot, if you couldn't tell.

22014326.review:
The first in a bunch of nep spinoff games, made by tamsoft the creators of senran kagura.

The gameplay is a hack and slash style compared to neps normal turn based RPG style, so its very different to other nep games and sacrifices a bunch of "advanced" nep mechanics like finding items, remakes, stellas dungeon and disc creation.

Dispite losing a lot the main game itself is very fun but it isn't super difficult, its very easy to not get hit due to the always included invincible dodge roll and invincible skill use, but it still a fun experience if you just enjoy the nep style and animations, both are done very well and tamsoft did a good job styling nep attacks into this faster form.

Also if the game is too easy just make sure to do super high leveled content really early in the game because that is really fun and very possible.

The story is incredibly short and thus the main game is incredibly short but the game tries to offer expansive endgame content instead of super engaging storyline, including a "endless" dungeon and a 1v1 arena.

Now the bad, IF are porting these games as is, so the localisation wont change from PSP to PC, so this was localised by a guy from NISA and has a large sum of completely changed lines most of these changed jokes just dont land for seemingly a lot of people.

Playing through all of the steam released neps so far with no actual japanese knowledge I could still gauge what some conversations were trying to do and how different the localisation took them, this game I couldn't get anything, lots of very obvious butchers of any meaning and completely headflipping of jokes, like changing a kids show theme joke where Ram is being very cute into a barbarian blanc show joke, which blanc doesn't follow up because it doesn't exist in the script.

This is the first nep localisation I have disliked so strongly, I recomend to turn japanese voices on and listen to the weird stuff that im sure Tamsoft had a ball making these voice actors say, dispite if you dont know japanese you will never know what they actually said.

[b]Good:[/b]
[list]
    [*]Gameplay
    [*]Style
    [*]Nep
    [*]Port
[/list]

[b]Bad:[/b]
[list]
    [*]"Localisation"
    [*]Main Storyline length
[/list]

22001369.review:
So i just beat this game, and here's my checklist for whether or not you will want this game.

You will like this game if:
-You were/are a fan of the hyperdimension neptunia series
-You like Dynasty warriors/ Hyrule warriors eseque gameplay
-You aren't looking for a particularly in depth story
-You want to turn your brain off, bash some trash mobs and listen to the BGM
-Idk, maybe your just here for the fanservice, which is literally just canned stripping animations and less clothing

You will not like this game if:
-You are looking for a game that has any sort of replayability or multiple endings(only has one ending)
-You are looking for a game that is long-lasting or has varied gameplay (game lasts about 14hours if you do all of the side missions, around 8 if you just bum rush the main story)
-You are looking for a good hack-n-slash game. Its an average hack-n-slash game with a plethora of colors and like a hundred enemies on the screen at any given time
-You are looking for a challenging video game. You could probably beat this game whilst playing tetris.

Alright, now on to the actual reveiw, which  will include more specifics on what the game does, how it is similar and differnt to the main game series, writing style, and other random gripes and praises. Warning: Word soup ahead

Review
First off, the main allure of every hyperdimension neptunia game is the characters, as they are fairly quirky and funny takes on various sterotypes and are generally quite funny. This game... it seems to have forgotten part of that, as eveything that makes the characters who they are is dulled out a little bit presumably because there is less dialouge to work with, meaning the character's individual personalities are shown 75% less and instead is replaced by inter-character interactions... Which would be great if only there was, i don't know, an actual REASON for the characters to interact? like a conflict of interest? or literally anything other than a random string of jokes, compliments and backhanded insults? A huge part of what made following the character development in the main games was the fact that they were faced by a tangible conflict in the form of other characters and subsequently overcame that and became friends/ tentative allies. This game has none of that and instead mostly replaces it with proof of character relation, which basically means the games spends a lot of time talking about how the characters interact with each other, but in a very one-directional way. so yeah thats my veiw on the overall writing style and no, i'm not going to comment on the fact that some of the lines are literally just super-cringeworthy memes. Moving on, the next thing i found intruiging is how they modifyed all of the assets from the main game( everything from game mechanics to maps) and how some of it was good, some of it just weird. The good part is that they made all of the various stats streamlined AF so you dont really have to think to hard about your strategy for hitting things, as well as the way the various meters(SP and EXE) are made easy to manage in a 3d fast-paced game enviroment. I also really like how they did the menus: if i needed to check something, it took like 3 clicks tops. Now the weird parts  are the map implementation and the enemy aggro mechanic. The maps are pretty much copy-paste from the main games, except they added barriers that basicly just railroad you down a single path, which would be fine if these maps served as awesome arenas, but they dont(in fact in some cases you wonder how in the world your supposed to fight in such cramped spaces). However, this problem is partially alleviated due to the inclusion of a few actual arena levels with lots of space, which i thought were the most enjoyable levels. Second flaw is kinda minor in that the enemy aggro ranges dont work right half the time, they suffer from the same problem the enemies in the main series did in that if you do anything but walk in a straight line they lose sight of you and just sit there for like a whole 5 seconds before noticing you again. Again, minor problem that only really presents itself if you try and kite a group for a mass wipeout. Next up, character imbalance, which i realize has existed in the past games and directly corellated with the characters confidence/skillset(which was awesome by the way) but it just doesn't mesh well in the genre because you cant have the party protect the weak character anymore, they are at the mercy of stun-locks and crazy high dps and there isn't shit you can do about it. For example, Rom and Ram are made as glass cannons in terms of stats... except that every other character is a fucking railgun in comparison, complete with reinforced metal plating. This differentiation leads to an unavoidable gap in how fun it is to play one character(the OP one) vs the other(the weaksause character), and thats a problem beacuse the game requires you to use every character every now and then. Next on the chopping block: the story. The fucking "story". want me to sum it up for you? [spoiler]You go and fight a big mech. The end[/spoiler]. If you didn't read that spoiler, then just take my word for it: It is more threadbare then the characters after the "outfit break" which is a problem because, as I pose at the begining of this giant fucking text wall, this game is about character, but also what the characters do and how they do it. Also, there are points in the writing were it uses taletale signs of leadup, like characters worrying about something hyper-specific or various off-handed would-be foreshadowing, and then does nothing with it and just sort of moves on. Anyways, my next point is the items and equipment system, aka kill stuff and get stuff. Yeah, it does away with the JRPG shop system in the main game and instead uses a medal system where you kill monsters and unlock gear in unlimited supply for all characters. The pro to this is, as mentioned before, stats become easy to manage. The bad part is that customization is narrowed down to which cosmetic outfit your character wears beacause the stat items uprade super linear-like, "A is better than B in every way" style. Overall, i feel like the system could  have been a lot more fleshed out, but at least it works(i guess). Finally, the moment you probably would be waiting for if you haven't left already: The combat and challenge. So, as you probably read on the store page, your clothes are not that of Geralt of Rivia whose silken cloth can witstand dragonfire. No, instead they will eventually rip and tear, resulting in fanservice, and(if your me) increased crit rate, EXE drive increase and increased damage recieved. Know how many characters fighting style this fits like a glove? All but 2, those being Rom and Ram, because they have low health and high base crit rate to begin with. This means that the game is mechanicly encouraging you to lose your clothes as it were, and gives you bigger numbers when you follow along, which i guess is to be expected of a mechanic of this variety. BUT this mechanic actually create a weird problem in that it locks the player into an aggressive playstyle because it is so disproportiontly rewarded. As a direct result, the already repetitive gameplay that is dynasty warriors punchy punchy is made even more one-dimensional due to the fact that you pretty much have to play it out in the same style everytime. Maybe this isn't a problem for you because your attack plan is always aggro, but many people like to play hack and slash cautiously, setting up for big efficent mass wipes by kiting and getting out of the way and turning into a damage sponge. Ok, now that that word pudding is done, time for me to talk about the challenge of the game. Basiclly, unless you equip that one item that makes you weak as paper  or go into a quest that is a much higher level, the game hands you victory for free.

That concludes this reveiw. Final verdict: its ok

22000774.review:
Para ser el primer juego hack & slash de la franquicia, Nep y sus amigas se defienden bastante bien. 

El juego cumple con su cometido, ofrecer un montón de monstruos para que los revientes con distintos tipos de ataques. Sin embargo, no es el tipo de juego al que puedas dedicarle un tiempo de juego contínuo, siendo más indicado para partidas rápidas.

Si lo que buscas es un juego entretenido para pasar el rato, con música pegadiza, mucho sentido del humor, y no te importa el exceso de fanservice, este juego podría resultarte interesante.

Por otro lado, no esperes una variedad de combos como en otros juegos del género, o una dificultad excesiva (más allá del modo díficil, que bien podría llamarse "modo imposible"), y mucho menos una larga duración. La historia se termina en un santiamén, y una vez terminada lo único que te queda es terminar con todas las misiones del modo historia, y completar los dos modos de juego ocultos con todas las chicas (alargan la duración, sí, pero se hubiera agradecido algo más de variedad).

Por lo que a mí respecta, estoy bastante satisfecho con la primera incursión de Neptune en el género de los Hack & Slash. Espero que el próximo Megatagmension Blanc + Neptune vs. Zombies sepa solucionar los problemas presentes en esta entrega.

海王星U虽然从PSV上移植到PC上，不过并不影响大家玩游戏的热情。
游戏的整体流畅度挺好的，不像RB系列会掉帧。
游戏画质感觉不是想象的那么好，毕竟一个2G大小的游戏，我也不做多的要求。
海王星U做成APRG是不错的，但是打击感还是略有欠缺。
爆衣系统我就不多说了，对于绅士们来说这是一个相当不错的福利。
通关后还有类似龙珠的天下第一武道会的1V1模式（这个梗- -），我也只过了第一个难度，后面难度一不注意就被秒。

游戏操作太简单，用手柄打的话怪物基本碰不着你，玩久了就会感觉比较乏味。
最大的缺点就是怪物太多，我记得有个图有2000个小怪墨迹了半天才过。
总体来说还是一款不错的游戏，喜爱海王星系列游戏的人可以考虑入手。

21996840.review: Fighting game with your favorite Neptunia characters! Think Dynasty Warrior-style endless waves of enemies (its not really endless but for some missions it can feel like it) and crazy combos. Each character has familiar moves and SP skills with the addition of a team attack that they can perform if both characters have enough special meter. The story is pretty light so almost little to no knowledge of prior games is alright but you might miss out on little jokes here and there. The short levels make progress feel pretty good and the little in between scenes break up monotony with the usual 4th wall breaking humor. If you were looking for a game you can tackle at a leisurely pace this is your game. The only gripe I have is the lack of leveling grinding spots post game (the colosseum gets old after a while).

21993339.review:
First off, I will say that HDN U: Action Unleashed is purely for Nep Fans only, I don't think anyone else will really enjoy the game.

Action Unleashed is a strange game, on one hand its boring, repetitive and short but its also full of classic nepnep moments which will keep Neptunia fans occupied for a while with post game content,  whilst the main game is more or less a small battle arena style game vs hundreds of monsters, the game can get unbalanced with some characters being far more useful than others, also some missions are extremely hard for the wrong reasons, such as killing thousands of monsters - its not hard, it gets boring and even starts to hurt your hands. 

I also liked the new characters Dengekiko and Famitsu (Based on famous real life Japanese gaming magazines) - the VAs did great jobs.  Hopefully in future games, they'll make more appearances. 

I think if Action Unleashed was more similar to Phantasy Star Universe then the game could have been amazing, but unfortunately it isn't.  What you get, I think is worth the $17 on sale price, but not worth the full price - I'm looking forward to the next spin off game to be released (Hyperdevotion Noire) 

Pros

Fast Hack 'n' Slash Combat
Runs fast and smooth at high resolutions
NepNep
Plenty of Postgame content 
Fan Service

Cons

Repetitive 
Short Story Mode
Not as satifying as previous games

21991947.review:
Starting this review, I want to emphasize that this game is mostly for Hyperdimension Neptunia fans. If you're fan of hack n slash genre but don't know Neptunia, there are most likely better options out there. That's not to say that this one is bad though. If you don't know Hyperdimension Neptunia this is bad game to start the series - the story somewhat assumes you know the characters already. It's much better to play Re;birth 1 instead.

The later part is aimed mostly to HDN fans.

On positives - In this game the good neptunia humor is still out there. The hack n slash mechanics are relaxing, albeit not too demanding, and the characters are distinct enough with their playstyles. I really enjoyed new additions to the roster - Dengekiko and Famitsu. Both are really cute and entertaining. I also love attention to small details in this game - like secondary characters comments during combat, lily rank dialogues, or even small coments the characters make when they are chosen or withdrawn for quests. I'm not really fan of fanservicey stuff, but I love the embarassed faces some characters make then, like Famitsu. It's adorable in it's own way.

On negatives - while jokes are there, there aren't too much of them, because story is really sparse. Re;birth counterparts are much more rich in plot (THAT plot as well). In addition Fanservicey stuff went a little too far with Rom and Ram. It's not that much of the problem though, as there are unbreakable clothes to equip. Still cringed for a moment. I'm not CFW Trick :( The balance is also not really there - some characters have much stronger combos and control than other ones. But all characters work well, so it's similar to RB games where basically any party worked. Game also lags at times, especially in snow stage for me or at beginning of the quest. Which is weird given my rather high-end PC. There is also an issue of sound - "Boss of DOS" track plays to often, and monster sounds gets annoying after short while. Hopefully they can be turned off while keeping godess' (and journalists) voices. And last but not least.... LILY RANKS. Thanks satan for reminding me times of korean grinder MMOs where leveling pace of 0,7% per hour was normal.

To sum up...

Positives:
+Good old Neptunia wit
+Dengekiko and Famitsu
+Fun hack n slash mechanics
+Diverse cast
+Funny enjoyable small dialogues thrown here and there (lily ranks, secondary character comments, character select comments)

+/- Quite heavy on fanservice (but it can be "turned off" by wearing ubreakable clothes so it's not the big issue for those who don't like it)

Negatives:
-Lackluster, sparse story
-Rom and Ram cloth breaking.... come on IF we're not CFW Trick in disguise :<
-Characters aren't really balanced
-Some technical issues - rare lagging
-Annoying monsters' sound effects and repetitive "Boss of DOS" track
-Lily rank grind

To me as HDN fan it's solid 7,5/10 game. It's not as good as RB counterparts, but the fun is still there, and if you like Hyperdimension Neptunia games, you'll most likely like this one as well. If you don't know HDN, you should definitely check out Re;birth 1!


TL;DR

Decent Neptunia entry, not as good as Re;birth counterparts but enjoyable enough.

7,5/10

21987595.review:
历时约10个小时通关游戏,全成就暂不考虑,总体来说比较令我满意,
[h1]我在推荐这款游戏的同时也建议大家理性购买[/h1]
(发售当天好友动态已被此游戏刷屏),下面是测评的正式内容,分块评价:
[h1]画面&剧情[/h1]
本作剧情很短基本可以无视,重心放在了战斗上面.角色&怪物&地图设定与之前几部海王星几乎相同,画面水平也是持平.
[h1]战斗&装备[/h1]
这款游戏的战斗总体来说我还是很满意的,攻击招式与技能效果较为绚丽,动作比较流畅,威力更是不俗,而且还带有配音(像Neptune攻击时的声音我就很喜欢),不足的是攻击方式及出招略微单调.
角色的等级为99级,比较容易达到,一般刷个任务就可以升两三级.装备系统简化为武器+三个辅助道具,游戏中没有金钱设定,道具的获得靠击败怪物获得对应怪物的徽章来解锁,一种怪物的徽章往往有多级(主要是装备和全队永久属性奖励).大部分的徽章比较好刷,解锁奖励对角色的加成也很可观.我认为本作徽章奖励解锁代替金钱购买的实际效果和平衡度还是很不错的.
[h1]爆衣系统[/h1]
(看别人谈论这个游戏的时候常常会提到这个爆衣系统就特意说下)其实我个人认为这个系统更多的是在战斗时快速的增加战力而非单纯的视觉观赏效果,如果觉得爆衣系统是购买游戏的主要动力的话建议再考虑一下.在最开始的时候看到爆衣可能会有新鲜感然后截图留念,随着游戏的进行角色获得了数件衣服后可能会更换自己中意的服饰,然而本作的爆衣系统旨在迅速爆掉衣服,心仪的衣服被怪摸一下直接就爆了,白白搭配.而且爆衣动画似乎不能跳过,看过几遍之后可能就觉得没意思了.还好游戏设定爆衣之后会为变身槽充能,可以迅速帮助角色施展变身等强力技能提高战斗力,到了游戏中后期爆衣只是用来提高刷图效率的了.

另外注意一点: 部分人可能会遇到游戏闪退之类的问题,目前主要集中在win10,我其中一台机子本来玩的好好的升级后就杯具了，我个人是在服务里暂时关闭了Touch Keyboard and Handwriting Panel Service后恢复正常，据说修复DX也可以改善这个问题,当然如果是win8系统的话会更好.
若有新的感想我会编辑这篇测评,希望这篇测评能作为大家购买前的一个参考.

21985326.review:
Neptunia U is a Hack N' Slash, and is a spinoff of the Hyperdimension Neptunia franchise. It was originally released for the PS Vita.

The story is that Gamindustri is in a very peaceful state, so two journalists called Dengekiko and Famitsu (Based off real magazines in Japan) ask the CPUs and CPU candidates to do some quests that they planned to get a good story going. Afterwards, the gang just completes more and more quests for the journalists, but there's been a rapid increase in quests, and everything is not what it seems.

The story obviously isn't as rich or deep as the main series, but it still has a plentiful amount of cutscenes and the writing is still solid. However, it isn't a huge chunk of the game like the mainstream titles. Fans of the series will be pleased with it, even if it is a little shallow. Due to the game's simple plot and gameplay, you won't find anything too interesting to write home about. At least the character interactions are still as good as ever.

Plus, the English dub is 100% voiced acted; there are no missing voices in any cutscenes, unlike the Re;birth series. (If that's your preference.)



You can choose from 10 characters: The CPUs, the Candidates, Dengekiko and Famitsu. Each of them play a bit differently, and all have their own stats. For example, Uni has a rifle so she's most effective at mid-range and building her special ability, while Neptune does quick but weak melee attacks. It's mostly melee oriented, excluding Uni, Rom, and Ram. The character's melee attacks are different though; some of them hit hard but can't string combos very well, and some can do the opposite. Everyone has the same run speed. There's also equipment that the characters can equip, adding or taking away certain stats like defense and SP. You earn these by killing a certain number of a certain enemy.

Related to all that stuff, there's a feature called "Costume Break" (Yes, this is where the fanservice comes in). If you take enough damage, your character's clothes will almost completely rip apart. What that does is that you're prone to taking more damage. However, you do more damage, so it's actually a risk vs. reward kinda thing. If you like or hate Costume Break, you can get variations of clothes that will affect this by leveling your characters up. There's unbreakable clothes that never trigger the break, easy to rip clothes that'll trigger break very easily, and pre-torn clothes to where you're immediately in Costume Break.



Gameplay is pretty different as you might of guessed. It's something like Dynasty Warriors if you wanna make a comparison. You can bring along 2 characters or go solo, and they fight one at a time. You're able to switch your character at any time unless they're KO'd, and the character in the back will regenerate HP. You have light attacks, heavy attacks, and special moves, and of course you can string together light and heavy attacks. Everybody has special attacks, and they take up either 1, 2, or 3 SP bars. You build up SP by simply attacking enemies. So because it's a Neptunia game, everyone can transform into their HDD counterparts, which upgrades all your stats and gives you superior attacks. (You'll also get all your clothes back if you were previously in Costume Break) You have an "EXE Drive" meter which builds as you attack enemies; this is how you go HDD. The character currently not being used will build EXE much faster than the one fighting. This is really all I can say about the gameplay, it is rather shallow sadly. Luckily, it's a lot of fun to slash down dozens of enemies at once, and if you're a fan of hack n' slash or want some dumb but frantic action, this is definitely for you.

The quests are where you'll choose which missions to do. They all carry a "recommended level" that your character should be, and some of them require 2 specific characters to use. The actual objectives are usually very simple. You either kill the boss enemy, kill a certain number of enemies, find a specific item, or locate an exit. There really isn't much variety to the missions, and they're all fairly simple. There are certain quests that don't have an objective, called an Irregular Quest. You simply hop into the mission and figure out what to do. (The description provides a hint)



After you beat the story, you unlock various things, including cheats, extra quests to complete, what's called "The Gamindustri Gauntlet" where it's a tournament style type of game mode where all the characters face off against one another in a 1v1 battle. You can pick whoever you want to play as and put the characters in whateve order you like. (You can even have HDD counterparts as separate characters.) If you win, you will win some new cheats and accessories that the characters can wear.


So anyway, Neptunia U is a pretty fun Hack N' Slash that just provides stupid fun in killing tons of enemies with a story that'll satisfy Neptunia fans enough. I recommend picking it up on a sale.

7/10

21984600.review:
จากการเล่นมาสักพักหนึ่ง  ก็เลยมาเขียนรีวิวการประกอบการตัดสินใจให้หลายคนเผื่อสนใจจะซื้อมาเล่น

เกมส์นี้ขนาดไฟล์แค่ 1GB กว่าๆเท่านั้น  ก็ถือว่าน้อยนะครับสำหรับเกมส์ปัจจุบัน(บางทีอาจจะเพราะพอร์ตให้vitaด้วย)  DLC จะได้ชุดว่ายน้ำมาของแต่ละคนกับอาวุธของ เหล่าเทพธิดา หลักๆ (น้องสาวกับพวกตัวละครค่ายจะไม่ได้)

ระบบจะเป็นแนว คล้ายๆสามก๊กมุโซแต่เป็นเขตเล็กๆกว่า นึกถึงนารุโตะที่เคยลง PSP แนวนั้นเลย

คำแนะนำเพื่อการเล่นง่ายครับ

1.ถ้าซื้อDLC จะได้หอคอยสำหรับเก็บเหรียญไว้แลกพวกอาวุธ ของกับค่าสเตตัสต่าง่ๆ  ซึ่งจะมี 20 ไปถึง 75 เลเวล แนะนำให้ใช้Blanc ในการเคลียร์จะง่ายที่สุด เพราะท่าไม้ตายของเธอTanzerin Trombe  ใช้แค่ 1หลอดเท่านั้น  แถมรอบตัว และแรงพอสมควรและระหว่างใช้จะไม่โดนโจมตีเหมือนเทพธิดาคนอื่นๆ

2.เกมส์นี้มีการเก็บ Lily Rank เป็นค่าความสำคัญ เท่าที่ไปอ่านมาจะวัดกันที่จำนวนครั้งในการเล่น ไม่ได้นับความยากเพราะฉะนั้นเล่นด่านห่วยๆจบไวๆจะทำให้เก็บค่าได้ไวขึ้น

3.แนะนำให้เก็บเหรียญมาแลกพวกอาวุธด้วย อาวุธบางอย่างแรงมาก (แรงกว่าDLC)  วิธีการที่จะได้ไวคือ ซื้อDLC หอคอยอย่างที่บอกจะเก็บเหรียญได้ไวกว่าไปนั่งเล่นทีล่ะด่าน

หวังว่าจะสนุกกับการเล่นเกมส์นะครับ

21984317.review:
I love Hack'n'Slash games and this one looked bananas (and inexpensive compared to the others on Steam, like the Warriors franchise). Played a level, the clothing mechanic makes me feel like a perve but the gameplay is actually really good.

Anyway, after the first level, game crashes: "Application has stopped working"

Try again--game didn't save. 

Start over. 

Look up some fixes, try compatability mode with windows 8. 

Try again--game didn't save.

Start over. 

Get through first level, it doesn't crash! 

Second level.

More characters!

Still no save points in game and no auto-save.

Get through level 2.

Crash.

Game didn't save.

I actually really like this game, and I know it just got released. Currently unplayable for certain rigs, unless you like an endless cycle of the first and second levels over and over.

Edit: Showing my ignorance with genres. 
Also, I'm running Win 10 with NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 with Intel core i5 660k. No AMD, which I'm told can cause problems.

Also I guess you can save after the second level, too bad I can't get that far :/

Gave up on it, guys, and got a refund. Thanks for trying to help.

21984311.review:
Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed จากซีรีย์ Hyperdimension Neptunia สงครามเทพธิดาโลกแห่งเกม ที่เป็นเกม J-RPG ออกมาให้เล่นหลายภาค และ อนิเมอีก 1 ซีซั่น (12 ตอน) แต่ในคราวนี้มาเป็นรูปแบบของเกม Musou กึ่งๆ RPG ไล่ตื้บมอนเตอร์พันศพ จากฝีมือของทีมงาน TamSoft ผู้สร้างซีรีย์ Senran Kagura (หรือที่เราเรียกๆ กันว่า เกมนินจานม) เกมเพลย์หลักของภาคนี้จึงเน้นให้เล่นแบบเกมแอ๊กชั่นเดินตีมอนเตอร์ที่เล่นง่ายๆ เข้าถึงได้กับกลุ่มผู้เล่นทุกกลุ่ม และก็ผสมความเป็นเกม RPG เข้าไปด้วยการเก็บเลเวลตัวละคร ทำเควส ตีมอนเตอร์เพื่อสะสมเหรียญมอนเตอร์ แล้วนำไปแลกเอาโบนัสบัพค่าสแตสตัวละคร

กราฟฟิกก็ถือว่าทำมาสวยงามในระดับของเครื่อง PS Vita ที่เป็นเครื่องแรกที่เกมวางขาย ซึ่งบนเวอร์ชั่น PC ก็นำงานเดิมมา Upscale ภาพให้เป็น 1080p ปรับการควบคุมให้รองรับจอย Xbox360 กับ คีย์บอร์ด และ รองรับระบบสตีม ด้วยการเพิ่ม Steam Achievement , Trading Card และ Steam Cloud

และส่วนที่ขาดไม่ได้ที่จะพูดถึงในภาคนี้คือเรื่อง Costume Break เมื่อตัวละครโดนศัตรูตีไปมากๆ จะทำให้ชุดสวมใส่ของตัวละครขาด ซึ่งมีผลให้พลังป้องกันตัวละครลดลง แต่แลกด้วยเพิ่มอัตราคริติเคิล และ เกจ EXE (เกจเปลี่ยนร่างและเกจไม้ตาย) เต็มไวขึ้นด้วย /// หลายๆ คนคงไม่สน อีตรงนี้หรอก สนจะดูชุดตัวละครที่ตัวเองชอบขาดมากกว่า ^_^

ส่วนที่อยากจะติ ก็มีตามนี้
- เนื้อเรื่องที่ค่อนข้างสั้น [spoiler]มีเพียง 3 แชปเตอร์เท่านั้น =_="[/spoiler]
- ระบบการเล่นที่ Repeatitive ซ้ำซาก วนลูป ไร้ความหลากหลาย (ถึงจะเล่นจบเนื้อเรื่องหลักไปแล้ว และมีโหมดอื่นมาให้เล่นเพิ่มก็เถอะ) ใครที่ไม่ชอบความซ้ำซาก แนะนำให้ผ่าน...

[i][b]** หากคุณเป็นสาวกซีรีย์ Neptunia ไม่ว่าจะเป็นอนิเม หรือ เกมภาคก่อนหน้า คงยากที่จะพลาดภาคนี้ หรือ คุณเป็นขาจรแล้วอยากลองเสพความโมเอะของตัวละคร และเกมเพลย์ที่เข้าถึงง่าย ลองซื้อมาเล่นดูครับ **[/b][/i]

21984185.review:
首先，这个游戏是信仰。对于喜欢这个系列的人来说，游戏质量不影响游戏乐趣与评价。不过凭良心说，制作方偷懒严重。很多内容都是用原先就有的东西。不过玩起来倒是很痛快倒是真的。

优点：
1，2位新角色很有趣，也很好用。
2，战斗特效贯承传统，很适合这种无双割草类游戏很酷炫。
3，人物可爱就不解释了。
4，感觉人物模型变的稍微有点精细了。

缺点：
1，制作简陋，地图几乎全部都是重生1的地图原封不动拿来用，音乐好多也是拿现成的，当看到下载大小才2g不到时就猜到了。
2，剧情一般，但流程有些短。几个小时就能通关，不过对于强迫症而言，还是需要玩段时间的。
3，可以看到不远的将来要更新的一堆付费dlc.

建议：
既然是割草，希望如果出续作的话，增加联机合作或对战内容。多一些新地图关卡。
最重要的是
多一点诚意

21983876.review:
地雷社奶粉作，如果您没玩过正传，强烈建议玩正传重生1，重生2，重生3。
当然这也算奶粉作里面有卖点的——能无双，能爆衣啊！！！

PC版方面，是PSV移植，所以高清素材狗牙还是很多。键盘按键意外比较合理，玩起来不会感觉特别按键别扭。
游戏本身来说作为无双类型的游戏如果是期待暗荣那样的三国无双恐怕会有失望了，战斗规模小，怪刷的一波很少，图和怪大量重复。如果要刷全成就，必须枯燥刷刷刷，完全是体力活，最后的爬塔，刷好感简直就是精神污染。

那么优点呢？萌啊!能看诺瓦露爆衣！还是高清（狗牙）！
顺便本作增加了2个新人物，电击酱和发霉通，可以体验一场BILIBILI。

21982403.review:
超次元游戏海王星U今天在steam上正式发售了，虽然这一作早在2014年就登陆了PSV有点炒冷饭的嫌疑，但这并不妨碍广大玩家购买的热情，作为同样第一时间入手的诺瓦玲在此为大家带来简单的评测，希望能为那些还在观望中的萌物们提供点意见（笑）

   这款游戏是地雷社首次一改以往的JRPG风格，做成了ARPG风格，也就是动作游戏。同时为了满足广大绅士玩家的需求，地雷社和著名绅士游戏厂商Marvelous通力合作，加入了爆衣系统，也是因为这个爆衣系统，让这一作超过了以往的作品在PSV上大卖（在下的绅士之魂在熊熊燃烧！！！）

   本作的世界观沿用的是rb1，没错就是那部官方都不愿意承认的独立黑历史作品。剧情很简单，就是由电击子和发霉通（对应某日本杂志）2位记者跟随女神们全程报道斩获信仰的故事。因此本作的菜单和rb1极为相似，还有不得不吐槽的画质，对于一个从rb1玩到rb3的海王星粉来说，画质再重新倒回rb1是一个不小的视觉冲击。

   这次的优化还算不错，没有出现什么较为明显的优化失误（1.6G的游戏有问题才怪了吧）抛去RB1稍显落后的画面不谈，人物的锯齿还是较为严重的，动作流畅度挺高，游戏性稍显落后，值得一提的是个有趣的小系统革新，每当人物的百合度每升级2格，就会有不同的对话，当然也是越来越亲密啦~

优点：
1.对一个PC的海王星爱好者来说，这一作依然是个不可多得的好游戏，毕竟海王星大法好
2.萌系的无双游戏，萌妹子，萌系怪物，教科书式的日系动作游戏
3.暴衣系统，这是本作的一个突出重点，也是吸引广大绅士爱好者的一个最重要理由
4.成就是目前PC上海王星4作里最友好的一作，相对于另外三个作品而言
5.合卡爽过吸大麻，少年不合一个徽章吗？这次居然良心的只有5张卡片，这一定是地雷社的阴谋！！！

缺点：
1.相对RB3较为落后的画质，会让人玩惯RB3的人极度不适应
2.这一作对键盘极度不友好，操作简直反人类，推荐手柄游戏
3.剧情简短，乏味。地雷社把这一作所有的特点上都压在了爆衣上，直接导致了游戏的可玩性下降，相信满成就之后，会很少有人会回头再碰一次这作了
4.战斗方式过于简单，缺乏紧张感。笔者是一个鬼泣爱好者，上手之前相当期待，拿到手之后，发现很多角色只要找好位置都可以一个键过关。玩久会非常乏味，但考虑到成就里的刷刷刷，笔者对未来刷成就非常恐惧

   无论如何对于一个海王星爱好者来说，本着充值信仰的宗旨是肯定要买的，但如果不是信仰党的话，这一作还是需要掂量一下再进行决定。U算是地雷社一个大胆的尝试，将RPG游戏做成了动作游戏，而它的续作“激次元组合 普兰,海王星VS僵尸军团”则取消了爆衣，而加入了线上合作模式，所以我对下一作更加期待，我希望能在明年和朋友们选择喜欢的角色一起线上玩耍，但在此之前只能购买这一作为地雷社充值信仰，让他们知道PC玩家也是不可忽视的一部分，只有这样才会有更多的海王星作品移植PC，最后让我们期待即将到来的“超女神信仰 激神黑心”。

21979173.review:
《Hyperdimension Neptunia U》是《Hyperdimension Neptunia》系列首次採用無雙動作玩法的動作冒險遊戲，跟以往回合制戰鬥風格有明顯差異之處，同時本作屬於外傳性質所以無需玩過前作就能理解劇情。玩法會有如此巨大改變或許是因為近年來玩家似乎逐漸厭倦回合制角色扮演遊戲，廠商也就因應市場需求將作品改成不需要動腦的無雙遊戲，畢竟誰不喜歡操縱著如神一般的角色在戰場痛宰敵人，只要再加上己方角色被攻擊時衣服會受損的設定，無雙玩法結合紳士內容的男性向作品想不成功擄獲廣大男性玩家芳心都很困難。

孔子門下學生孟子曾經說過：『生於憂患，死於安樂。』，意思就是一個國家處於和平狀態過久就會產生怠惰之情，一國之君如果將國事荒廢又不勤練兵卒，那麼該國將會面臨滅亡的命運。遊戲業界是受到四女神保護的世界，經歷犯罪組織以及七賢者兩大威脅後終於迎來久違的和平日子，不過四女神跟生活在遊戲業界的居民都覺得沒有反派來搗亂讓生活十分無聊，於是意識到遊戲業界沒過多久將死於安樂的兩名媒體記者出現並給予四女神與女神候補生重責大任，就是透過完成討伐怪物任務來證明自己才是最強大的女神！


承接任務方式跟前作大同小異，玩家僅需在主畫面選擇任務界面，就能依照各項任務的建議等級來執行，最基本的普通任務可同時支援兩名角色參戰，玩家能自由配置喜歡的角色配對加入遊戲，遊戲正式開始時只要按下方向鍵下便可隨時切換兩名角色。除了普通任務之外還支援角色限定任務，玩家必須選擇指定角色參與任務，以及必須完成特定需求才能通關的特殊任務，這些限制不僅讓遊戲本身難度提升，使得玩家能在通關時獲得更高酬勞和成就感，另一方面也使看似無腦割草無雙遊戲增添不少變化性。


《Hyperdimension Neptunia U》最大特色就是角色服裝有耐久值設定，如果讓敵人持續攻擊到服裝耐久值降為零時就會顯示出服裝破壞特寫，想像一下角色因為服裝破損臉紅心跳，急忙用雙手遮蔽重要部位的景象，簡直叫人把持不住啊！特別要注意的是服裝破壞會造成防禦力下降許多，但致命一擊機率明顯上升。服裝遭到破壞或打倒敵人都會增加【EXE Drive】計量表，計量表達到百分之五十時就能變身為女神形態，進入女神形態的角色各項數值則大幅提升，消耗所有【EXE Drive】更能施展強力必殺技一舉消滅場上所有敵人。


相較於其他《Hyperdimension Neptunia》遊戲，《Hyperdimension Neptunia U》很明顯讓人感受出是專門賣給粉絲的作品，戰鬥方面過於簡單導致只要不斷連打攻擊鍵，適時閃避敵人攻擊就可以輕鬆越級闖關（除非你很紳士想要每關都在衣服破光狀態打通）。老實說本作難易度並不是說很高，甚至用極低兩字形容都不為過，對不擅長遊玩動作遊戲的新手玩家來說應該是款不錯的入門作，對於大多數熟悉動作遊戲玩法的正常玩家來說，本作少了些許挑戰性，加上重複刷關卡強化角色的玩法一直都是無雙類作品的硬傷，缺乏變化性的內容導致長時間遊玩容易產生疲倦感，要不是《Hyperdimension Neptunia U》是以大家熟悉的四女神與女神候補生作為主要角色，不然筆者可能不會如此熱衷於這款無雙動作遊戲。


優點：
+重返遊戲業界，首次採用無雙動作玩法有別於系列作的回合制戰鬥傳統。
+可操縱角色多達十名，要全部練到滿等應該要花費四十小時總遊戲時數。
+紳士指數滿點的服裝破壞系統，爆衣還能獲得額外的致命一擊機率。
+依然廣受好評的全程對話配音，在這裡為專業聲優們致上最深敬意。


缺點：
-玩法缺乏變化性，任務要求擊殺特定數量怪物，無腦連打攻擊鍵就能通關。
-難度偏低，畢竟是賣給粉絲的作品，就不要求本作要有血尿到不行的難度。


結論：褒大於貶的日系萌妹無雙爽 Game ，適合作為戰機少女系列入門作。


網誌圖文好讀版：
http://mgrim214.blogspot.tw/2016/03/hyperdimension-neptunia-u.html

21979107.review:
Fun Hack and Slash take on the Hyperdimension Neptunia series. Sorta like the Dynasty Warriors games in which you fight hoards of weak enemies and then take on a stronger boss enemy. You know the deal. Lots of combos and special attacks. Has the HDD mode from the other games and ultimate attacks which are very nice to look at. There are a lot of extras as well like items to unlock, music mode, a pause menu that lets you rotate and zoom the camera to get that ideal screenshot of the action. Just an enjoyable experience all around.

I am not even super into the series myself. Didn't even finish the first game even. But I did like the characters and the VN sections. I just could not get into the combat and slow pace of the game. Specifically the weird positioning in combat and the grinding. But this game kept all the good stuff and got rid of the boring combat! Luckily this is just a spinoff that can be enjoyed on its own. So if you want a little anime hack and slash action go ahead and check this out. It has fully voiced VN sections and Fun combat.

Negatives would be the lack of graphics options. This is a Vita port though so it shouldn't be too hard to run or anything. But it would have been nice to have the basic graphics options for a PC game. I had another negative but I forgot what it is. I will edit later if I remember.

Side note. The clothes tearing isn't such a big deal. Some people may be put off by it though. There is a way to get rid of it but you have to get beat up a few times before you unlock the unbreakable outfit. I don't even really notice it myself. You get the little splash when it happens then its business as usual. And the after battle close up but its like dude this series always had fanservice.

21978135.review:
HDN U встречает игрока довольно бодрым рубиловом. В комплекте кроме него идут так же: раздевания, разные игровые режимы и хорошия новые персонажи (dengekiko ftw).
Что может помешать удовольствию: рубилово не разнообразное, сюжет тут ХУДШИЙ из всех спиноффов серии (даже HDN PP, которая вряд ли доберется до ПК, лучше в этом плане), модификация боевого стиля персонажа и его внешнего вида на уровне каменного века (перекрашенные бодисьюты и наряды, да еще и не особо красиво перекрашенные иногда), дисбаланс всего и вся. Юни, Ром и Рам аннигилируют врагов на расстоянии (а в HDD так еще и на ходу), Нептуния явно имбовее других персонажей ближнего боя, дуэли - несбалансированный ад, Нептральная башня - доооолгое удовольствие с крайне трудноубиваемым боссом в конце (без мобов не фармятся шкалы на HDD и EXE, без читов это всеми персонажами пройти практически нереально).
Итог: непуэкшон, сделанный в духе серии, но с рядом серьезных минусов. Без теплых чувств к HDN лучше не играть, наверное.
UPD Босса в конце башни занерфили.

21977125.review:
Этот долбаный НАУ РОАДИНГ - вынесет вам мозги.
Больше не пошаговая, теперь экшен в реальном времени. Графика кажется стала чуток хуже, зато теперь одежда уничтожается. Остальное тоже самое, вот только есть один мину. Боольшой такой минус - камера сделана убого до невозможности. Если в предыдущих можно было плевать на это - на своем ходу ее можно было легко развернуть, то тут нет. Тут с камерой все ой как плохо, большую часть времени она отвернута от монстров и показывает противоположное направление, а разворачивать ее просто банально нет времени. В итоге привыкаешь и... бьешь монстров на ощупь. Отличный экшен где нужно бить противников наощупь. Если понравились предыдущие части - брать можно. Если нет - потеряете время, просто потому что в плане экшена можно найти сходу с десяток примеров лучше чем эта игра. Как-то вот так. Начинать с этой игры знакомиться с серией просто бесполезно.
П.С. На самом деле можно игру рекомендовать несколько проще, а именно тем, кому нравится сама нептуния или ее вселенная, или же тем кому интересно глянуть как выглядела бы нептуния в слешер-стиле, а не пошаговом. Иначе смысла брать просто нету. Ибо внимание - боевка довольно примитивная: хватает выученного одного комбо на перса что бы проходить все. Сам проходил Непкой и ее сеструхой, так как ими можно в форме HDD фактически бить и двигаться постоянно, что уменьшает урон почти до нуля (по тебе просто мало кто попадет, так как ты все время в движении, но при этом атакуешь). Вот как-то так.
П.П.С. По правде говоря сказать что камера гавно - это просто ничего не сказать. Согда бьешься с сильным босом, а его практически не видишь, зато у него есть 1-2 скила ваншот - это просто блядский пиздец. Да, есть кнопка развернуть камеру, но она работает раз через пять и то если повезет. Но при этом слегка сдвигаешься и камера опять старается показать твоего персонажа так, что бы противника видно не было. Хуже камеры чем в этой игре, поискать - хрен найдешь.

所以割草+海王星+41%Off，大概我连DEMO和游戏简介都没看完手已经剁了。

初玩一会儿，相对于款ACT游戏，战斗BGM很到位。地雷社的游戏场景一如既往但本作出乎意料地流畅（刷怪和技能释放会有轻微掉帧，可能是本人问题）。传统无双惯用的轻重攻击结合搓招，采用量化的SP槽然后不同技能对应不同的消耗，这个设定相对不错可以让战斗过程流畅痛快选择多变且不会出现气槽不够[strike]（便秘）[/strike]的问题，否则面对怪海还需冒着风险平A攒气放大招（小怪的攻击太疼了...教学关的杂兵打一下都有十分之一，被暗荣惯坏了），总之单独场景的战斗玩起来十分爽快。

21976416.review:
首先先安利一下超次元游戏海王星重生系列

这作和重生系列不同，是ACT（动作类）游戏，人设和背景是一样的，但是游戏操作类型完全不同。键盘操作的改键也最好是打打试试，用之前rb系列的用起来不顺手。

人物模型是重做了的，剧情部分人物的动作也增多了，配音更有声色，并且增加了很多的打斗时的动态语音（没注意是不是立体声的，打的时候招式相同听多了大概会洗脑吧），特别是有18种now loading，配合加载时的一些人物介绍，可以充分体验日式英语的发音。值得一提的是类似确认取消的系统音由10名角色配音随机出现，有些はい可以听一年系列。
配音可选日语英语，字幕只有英语，可以拿来同时学习两门外语（笑）。

对显卡要求略高于之前的几作。背景音乐和地图还有小怪基本就是照搬重生的，可以说偷懒吧……也可以说复古吧……游戏容量不大，下载要1.6G整体使用硬盘2.8G，比之前重生的小点，流程短一些，贴图质量……要么是他们有了新的加压模式。

成就依然是分为剧情，特殊的比如刷999999伤害，还有最累的刷百合度。全成就倒也不是很难，3、50小时相信你也可以的。
卡牌部分是共5张，免费掉3张，对于合成徽章来说会稍微省一点(?)。背景完美。

讲道理的话，键盘操作的改键依然是好评的，有两个键盘按键对应同一个手柄按钮，比精灵剑士F要好用很多。为了你键盘的可持续发展，建议把XY键设置在你不常用并且能顺手按到的键位，比如【】。

至于爆衣……R17的，暴露的并不多，而且一般爆衣了之后你就要小心被打挂了，并不会有特别的心情去看。另外，这游戏的难度属于中等偏简单难度，ACT新手也能割菜系列，因为没有自动存档和稳定性问题，建议及时存档，基本每次完成一个任务就存一下的好。

那么，お楽しみに！

21974902.review:
Once again the cast of the Neptunia series returns for another title! But wait! This time it's a Hack'n'Slash ARPG instead of the traditional RPGs that Neptunia players are so accustomed to. So... How is Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed?

First things first, the gameplay is rather smooth with natural combos - this is coming from a player who is absolutely trash at action games and prefers to stick to turn-based RPGs, so little issue there. The game runs rather well, even without a high-end setup, though some may find the graphics lacking as compared to other Neptunia titles.

The aim of the game is to select up to two characters from the roster (CPUs, Candidates as well as 2 new characters) and slash your way through hordes of familiar Neptunia foes. By performing combos, the EXE gauge fills up, eventually enabling the use of HDD, which transforms the character and boosts their stats and granting new combos. That said, this system is simple but rather robust. Another "unique" aspect of HDU is the addition of "Costume Break", which is basically  a system that reduces characters' clothing as they get hit. Less clothing results in a loss of defense but offensive stats increase. Seems somewhat unnecessary, but hey. It is what it is -.^*

Customization is similar to the older titles, bringing back some of the costumes from previous Neptunia games. More of a just-for-fun aspect that enables you to make your Neptunia Goddesses look the way you like them. Weapons and Accessories can be swapped out, so theoretically it's possible to challenge yourself considering the games' difficulty isn't all that high (especially compared to the grind factor in previous turn-based RPG titles). But this is a Neptunia game, these games aren't all that hard anyway.

Still the same old RPG x Visual Novel we all know and love however, with a storyline that seems much quirkier than the traditional games, but still filled with fourth wall breaking and Nepnep style humor nontheless. Always fun to read through (plus, as usual, Japanese voices are included if you so desire).

Only issues so far are some minor gameplay elements including difficulty. Overall a fun title for Neptunia fans, so long as you don't hate ARPGs or dislike the Costume Break mechanic.

21972996.review:
Not what I was expecting.

Haven't beat it yet but already needs a few things said about it.

Alright, so if you've played the earlier games and you expect this one to be the same gameplay-wise, you will be disappointed.

Basically this went from the JRPG turn system to a hack and slash system kind of like Dynasty Warriors or the RWBY game, and you basically play as one tag team of which you can switch between two selected characters during a battle.

Character customization is great as always but finding and getting new equipment is a bit less simplistic to do so than in the other games.

Why am I talking about the gameplay mechanics, the highlight of this game is a new feature called "Costume Break", the entire focus on this new mechanic is definitely fanservice, basically your character's clothing functions like a seperate health bar but you don't lose if it gets torn up, the weaker your clothes are, the weaker your character's defense but it increases critical hit rate and EXE gauge fill. (It's basically charge for a special attack if you don't know what it is.)

If you are a fan of the series and don't mind hack and slash gameplay then I reccomend this game, controls are different from the other games but like the other games, the controls grow on you and are easy to remember.

Being a new release, expect it to have several glitches and errors, I had to re-download the game because the first time I set the resolution to 1920x1080 and full screen and it deleted the .exe file, but apart from that I've not seen any other game breaking issues.

Of course this review is not finished and will be seeing updates but so far it is a pretty good change from the JRPG style and still maintains the Hyperdimension atmosphere and blahblahblah Nep-Nep everyone!

21972620.review:
Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed เป็นภาคแรกของซีรีย์ Neptunia ที่เป็นแนว Hack and Slash โดยเน้น High Speed Action พูดง่ายๆคือเป็นแนวแบบรวดเร็ว ฟันๆเร็วๆ คอมโบเร็วๆรัวๆ โดยภาคนี้ มี Tamsoft ที่ทำ Senran Kagura มาเป็นส่วนหนึ่งใน Developer ด้วย และสิ่งที่ผมจะเขียนรีวิวต่อไปนี้เป็นสิ่งที่ผมได้รับรู้เกี่ยวกับระบบภายในเกม หากสิ่งที่ผมรีวิวมีข้อมูลผิดพลาดประการใด ขออภัย ณ ที่นี้ ด้วยครับ

21971837.review:
第一时间入了，不知不觉刷了几个小时。
随便评价下这个游戏。
不同于重生的RPG，本作是无双割草。
游戏内容量和刷刷刷的要素比起重生少不少，这点从游戏体积就可以看出来，算是一点遗憾。
游戏场景和BGM以及怪物模型秉承优良传统（偷工减料）沿用的过去系列资料，全是熟人（笑）
玩到现在为止对话全程语音，应该可以确定是全程带语音，loading界面、装备设定等等地方都有CV配音，对CV厨来说大满足。
以及最最重要的是，由于是闪乱神乐制作组协助制作的，动作流畅、手感很不错，还有喜闻乐见的爆衣系统、拍照系统供绅士们把玩。
不过游戏过程中由于镜头比较靠近玩家角色，而且镜头角度为固定视角，需要玩家在战斗中手动转动导致体验十分蛋疼。本人是使用键盘进行的游戏，用方向键操作视角十分不便，而使用视角重置键（LR）则有重置响应缓慢的问题，而且说明上所谓的锁定功能也没有试出来，建议手柄操作。
战斗中怪物的攻击判定十分猎奇，通过攻击动画无法判断攻击距离，而且由于敌我双方都有不同程度的霸体属性，导致战斗中经常会连击中莫名被打掉血的情况。
综上，本作综合素质良好，加上开卖就带打折对于萌豚来说买买买就是了。对非系列粉丝来说，本作游戏体验还算良好，割草比起老牌大厂暗荣的无双虽然还是相形见绌，但是对比无双系列STEAM的售价和目前本作的售价来说绝对是够值回票钱的，可以入手一试。
PS：买太早玩了几个小时居然没出卡，出来发现DLC能买了。。。

Надоели пошаговые стратегии? Надоели красивые абилки с однотонным задним фоном? Бесконечный гринд? 
Вам предоставляется возможность окунутся в незабываемый хак н слеш из серии Нептунии.
"кровавое" мессиво делаем мы из сотен врагов, счетчик комбо переваливающий за тысячу, миллионы урона, вот, что мы получаем. 
Из героев нам предоставляются известные CPU и их сестры, а также 2 новых персонажа в серии, журналистки. 
В общем, что могу сказать. Экшен, экше и еще раз экшен, времени на обдумывания нет, мы не в стратегии, каждый удар на счету. 
Также приятным новвоведением (фишкой игры) это то что героиня может износить одежду (защита падает, но EXE шкала наполняется быстрее). 
Лично я залип, приятно окунуться в любимую серию игр под другим ракурсом.

21968593.review:
tl;dr decent hack'n slash attempt, worth the discounted price but not really at full price.

Some of important things you should know:
-Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed is a Hack n' Slash game, but with Neps, you won't see any turn-based here.
-Did I said the port was amazing? at least for me. EDIT: Some peope can't get this game to run on their rig, be warned
-If some of you gonna complain about IFI re-using game assets, heads-up, they are. But it's fine for me because it's a spinoff with Hack n' Slash, now go complain about something else.
-Story... well, it is the same dimension as in Re;Birth 1, but the story is pretty much nonexistent for me, or that I just skip the dialogue too much.
-Some people say the localization took liberty, be warned.
-Still, decent jokes, which are Neptunia series charm.
-Unless you're going for every achievements, the content is pretty short.
-There's some NSFW stuff such as Custom Break, you might want to consider it if you play it with your family.
-It's not on par with AAA Hack n' Slash title, but is not too bad either IMO, reason for this is bad enemy AI for most of the times, broken and underpowered moveset for some characters, and some more stuff, I guess worth the discounted price for now, but on full price you might want to reconsider it.
-Obviously not for hardcore ones though, this one feels more casual, consider this if you need a break from DW or something similar

Overall, a decent attempt at Hack n' Slash game, you might worth it more if you're fan of the franchise.

21967910.review:
Seems like a fun mindless game where you bash cute things on the head with sticks and see some anime tittays from time to time. Sadly the port itself is so atrocious that I cannot recommend it and because of that I'm refunding it and getting my money back.

If you can tolerate a terrible image quality, 1080p limit, general blurrines, stuttery animations, terrible sound effects AND you are a waterproof weeb (with all due respect), you might just enjoy it! Given the amount of succesfull idea factory games on steam, you would think that they would put more effort into their ports. They choose go with the "bare minimum" route only because they can get away with it. They also will not support their games for longer than a few weeks. Much like how they abandonned Hyperdimension 2 mere weeks after release, the game still crashed on me constantly, but the devs said they were "Working on a fix". All this time later and not a single word from them and obviously I was unable to refund it because it had been so long. Get your sh*t together guys.

Nepnep games are simple, silly fun, but the publisher and the lazy people who do the ports are not worth your money. Think carefully if you wish to support their lazy ways.

21967877.review:
Hack and Slash gameplay (Different gameplay from the earlier HDN games on Steam).
Originally a PS Vita game, so this is presumed to be a PC port.

+Dress Breaking!?
+Character Customization
+"Physics" are nice
+Special Attack Customization
+Slightly expanded roster (2 new characters)


-No (official) support for resolutions higher than 1080p
-No Anti-Aliasing
-No Quality Settings of any kind (only resolution and Full/Borderless/windowed options)
-Analog input seems to be digital...?

It's a solid game, I just wish they added more... PC Optimized features.
Would recommend to all Otakus.
Would recommend to all Perverts.

Would not recommend to the hardcore PC gamer.
